column4: So... when the Steam client for Linux comes out of beta do you think you guys will probably get a lot busier since they are designing it for Ubuntu 12.04?
we allready get dozen questions about it a day
i imagine ther ewill need to be a #ubuntu-steam channel. ;P
Yeah, I imagine
Even Stallman had something vaguely positive to say about it, I was shocked
wasn't he always? I mean even in the early days?
Netflix works on Linux or just on Chromebooks?
theres a .deb that uses wine and has ti working on normal ubuntu now
im suprised that wasent front page in all the blog sites..
Oh my....
I must find this!
I was typing so fast trying to add the ppa and and install that I had to redo it twice :-P
amazon prime has a montly plan now alwo
Not anymore
they just started doing it like last month i thought.. they allready got rid of it? ;P
trust me I've spent hours in chat and on the phone with them about that, yeah they already stopped it
You absolutely made my day today...
now you can go watch all the SpongeBob shows. ;)
grr... it says "please enable the user_xattr option for your filesystem and try again." when I try to install, gotta remember how to fix that
never seen that error/message - just using normal ext4 here

It appears that you do not have extended file system attributes enabled, please enable the user_xattr option for your filesystem and try again. is the whole message, no reason not to enable it I guess
Well the netflix thing works but it's a bit choppy gonna try with a lighter weight DE, maybe LXDE of XFCE
what do you expect from wine running firefox ;)
the netflix thing starts ff for windows under wine in kiosk mode for some reason, but you hit F11 it fixes that
